hypothesis_1.business_implication: Geographic-based pricing and marketing are empirically justified

hypothesis_2_3.null_hypothesis: No risk differences between high/low density zip codes
hypothesis_2_3.business_implication: Zip-code-level analysis may require more data

hypothesis_4.null_hypothesis: No association between gender and claim frequency
hypothesis_4.business_interpretation: While a statistical difference exists, pricing must rely on a multidimensional risk assessment
